mapper.select: SELECT m.id,m.name,m2.name FROM t_menu m JOIN t_menu m2 ON m.parent_id = m2.id;

SELECT m.id mid, m.`name` mname, m.icon micon, m.url murl, m.component mcomponent, m1.* FROM t_user u LEFT JOIN t_user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN t_role r ON r.id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN t_role_permission rp ON rp.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN t_permission p ON p.id = rp.permission_id LEFT JOIN t_menu m ON p.menu_id = m.id LEFT JOIN t_menu m1 ON m.parent_id = m1.id WHERE u.id = #{id} ORDER BY m1.id
